availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Erasmus Dow Askins (Washington County, Kentucky, physician.)

body.p: Washington County, Kentucky, physician. Garrard County, Kentucky, native. Son of John Askins and Ann Askins. Married to Jemima Farris Askins in Washington County, Kentucky, on January 8, 1844. Married to Elizabeth Moore Askins in Washington County on September 15, 1865. Attended Centre College in Boyle County, Kentucky. Physician in Washington County in 1850. Physician in Washington County in 1860. Owned six enslaved persons in Washington County in 1860.

ab.bibl:

Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Washington County Marriages, Film #000551246, p. 656.
The Biographical Encyclopedia of Kentucky(Cincinnati, OH: J.M. Armstrong & Company, 1878), 556.
